id.description: The ID of the repository. Primary Key.
id.comment: Eliminates the need to have our own arbitrary 'id' field, correlates back to the github repository.

owner.description: The ID of the owner of the repository. Foreign Key (User table).

full_name.description: The full name of the repository, includes the owner's name.

fork.description: A flag indicating whether or not this repository is a fork.

url.description: The API URL for the repository.

html_url.description: The HTML URL for the repository.
